title: 10 days of glory: the Gallipoli pilgrimage 1990
brief_description: Traces the events leading up to the visit by ANZAC veterans to Gallipoli for the 75th anniversary memorial service at Anzac Cove. Includes personal experiences of the diggers and some of their former enemies, and highlights from the Prime Minister’s speech at Lone Pine. Presented by Peter Couchman.
